Who We Are ?

We here at UniPhi Car Cleaning are a newly established business and are committed to providing the optimal solution for your dealerships car cleaning needs. We have been in business for 5 years now and have designed car cleaning protocols for over 20 dealerships in South Australia.

Our Goal

Our Goal is to provide the most optimal and cost-effective solution for your dealerships car cleaning needs. We provide a cleaning service that is tailored to the unique circumstances of your dealership and take many factors into consideration when designing a cleaning protocol.

OUR LATEST WORK

Service We Offers

Our service begins by assessing the frequency of how often the cars on your yard need to be cleaned:

We take into consideration:

  1. The standard you would like your cars to be
  2. Seasonal weather conditions
  3. Proximity to trees and other pollinating plants
  4. Distance to main road
  5. Length of exposure of the site

Based on these factors we determine how often your yard needs to be cleaned and what days during the week will best suit the dealerships needs.

WHAT WE DO

Why Choose Us

Many Dealerships around South Australia have begun to ditch their car yard hand and instead use our service. After using our service, many have not gone back to the traditional yard hand model. Why?

  1. Most dealerships find our service is cheaper than hiring their own yard hand full time
  2. As we send in a team of yard hands, the yard is completed much quicker
  3. If your dealership is accessible before hours, most of the time your yard is completed prior to opening (meaning you’ll never see a dirty yard!
  4. We offer multiple services that cannot be completed by a single yard hand alone
  5. During the event of rain or bad weather, we simply reschedule the service to a later time
  6. We supply the chemicals, equipment and chamois. Saving your dealership money
  7. All our yard hands are experienced, in the case of a new worker they are trained amongst experienced yard hands, making them get good at what we do, quickly. This makes our quality of work really high

Still not convinced?

We have no lock in contract. Give us a go and if you’re not happy with our service there is no need to commit!

We have been in business for 5 years now and have designed car cleaning protocols for over 20 dealerships in South Australia.
